sentences.sContent: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.sCn: 这样不仅仅得到的水蒸气，但是你会得到一些氮氧化物，或者如大家所知到的nox，这是烟雾的前驱体。

remMethod.val: pre (前) + curs (跑) + or → 跑在前面的人 → 先驱

trans.tranOther: something that happened or existed before something else and influenced its development
